project.title: SD-GUI
project.blurb: Stable Diffusion GUI & model hosting system: hot-swap models, manage queues, and expose clean HTTP endpoints.
project.description: SD-GUI is a pragmatic controller and web UI for Stable Diffusion-class models. It can run locally or as a headless service, provides health checks and queue metrics, supports scheduler/steps/CFG/seed/size parameters, and exposes a simple REST API for downstream apps. Models can be referenced via local paths or remote registries. Designed for reproducibility and low friction ops.

versions.notes: Model switching endpoint, health API, basic gallery, and queue stats.
